title: Richardson RFPD Expands IoT/M2M Product Portfolio
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/10/2015 @ 10:40 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Richardson RFPD 
GENEVA, Ill. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Richardson RFPD, a global component distributor specializing in advanced connectivity solutions, today announced an expanded IoT/M2M product portfolio. In response to increasing global demand for advanced connectivity solutions, Richardson RFPD is now featuring an expanded selection of wireless connectivity products for M2M development. The company is showcasing its latest product innovations at CTIA Super Mobility conference in Las Vegas this week. 
Richardson RFPD’s M2M offerings range from low-cost embedded cellular infrastructure technologies and scalable modules to full-function gateway solutions designed to address diverse industries and applications such as medical, oil and gas, automotive and transportation and many other industrial market needs. 
“As the IoT/M2M opportunities develop, we’re focused on supporting the M2M developer with core cellular and wireless technology solutions,” commented Steve Lieberman, Global Product Management Director, IoT/M2M, from Richardson RFPD. “Our experienced field support team will guide customers through the entire process – from concept-to-prototype-to-production and beyond. We have the resources to help engineers build the foundation for scalable M2M projects.” 
Built upon relationships with leading M2M manufacturers, Richardson RFPD specializes in advanced wireless technologies including cellular (2G/3G/4G/LTE), Bluetooth, WiFi, proprietary ISM, ZigBee modules, adapters, gateways as well as GPS modules and trackers. In addition, the company carries an extensive line of accessories, including antennas, cables and connectors.
